Name: Celery
Notes: Most widely used distributed task queue; broker-based

Name: Dramatiq
Notes: Reliable message-driven workers; lighter than Celery

Name: Huey
Notes: Lightweight; async tasks and scheduled jobs

Name: Sidekiq
Notes: Industry standard; processes millions of jobs; fast

Name: Resque
Notes: Battle-tested in high-traffic apps; easy forking

Name: queue_classic
Notes: Lightweight; async polling; no external deps

Name: Asynq
Notes: Simple and fast; priorities; optimized for Go

Name: BunnyPHP
Notes: Pure-PHP AMQP client; async with ReactPHP

Name: PHP Queue
Notes: Unified interface; REST server; CLI daemon

Name: Que
Notes: Built-in Erlang database; no external deps

Name: Gearman
Notes: Distributed job queue; clustering; high availability

Name: Redis Streams
Notes: In-memory; simple pub/sub; fast but ephemeral

Name: Google Cloud Tasks
Notes: Serverless task queuing; HTTP tasks; Cloud Run
